troubleshooting.title: Temel sorun giderme
troubleshooting.description:
A) Wipe data and cache of 

(I) Vanced/Vanced Music and microG for Non-Root Variant

 (II) Vanced/Vanced Music and Google Play Services for Root Variant

B) Reinstall YouTube Vanced

> IMPORTANT NOTICE: Reboot between processes

troubleshooting.title: Oturum açma sorunları
troubleshooting.description: Sık karşılaşılan bazı hataları gösteren birtakım görüntüler aşağıdadır, izleyeceğiniz çözümde size fikir verebilir.

fields.title: "İnternet bağlantınızı kontrol edin" diyen bir hata alıyorsanız
fields.content: Şu video kılavuzu izleyin: https://youtu.be/S5sTXRTrD5Y. MicroG'nin uygulama verilerini de silin.

fields.title: Giriş yaparken "Çevrim dışısınız, indirilenlere göz atın" uyarısıyla karşılaşıyorsanız
fields.content:
1. Clear DATA of both Vanced microG and Google Play services
2. UNINSTALL both "Vanced microG" and Vanced.

3. Reboot if you want.

4. Reinstall both APKs[microG and Vanced) but make sure you install microG before you install Vanced. Install via Vanced Manager or sai using files provided in #installation note in group

5. Now login.

NOTE: If you're still having issues with Vanced giving connection errors (even after installing microG first), receiving notifications, etc, make sure you disable battery optimization for the Vanced and microG app. 

Instructions to do so vary on your device manufacturer. You can folloe guides like https://dontkillmyapp.com or search it up.

fields.title: If you are getting an error that says "Trouble connecting to Google servers", please do either of the following to fix the issue.
fields.content:
1. Uninstall vanced microG and reinstall it again.

2. Use the Huawei spoof button within microG sign-in page.

fields.title: If Vanced logs out of your Google account
fields.content:
It happens because your device OS' heavy battery optimization killing microG services/activities which are responsible for logins.

To fix this, disable battery optimization for microG using https://dontkillmyapp.com OR searching it up

fields.title: For users who are using Gsuite account on Non-Root version of vanced and facing connection issues frequently (errors like "You are offline", "Please check your internet", etc)
fields.content:
1. Log into your Gsuite account [admin console](https://admin.google.com/)

2. Search for device management

3. Go to setup and disable "Mobile Management"

4. That's it and it will get fixed.

fields.title: Huawei workaround 1
fields.content: Use the Huawei spoof button when signing in with latest available vanced microG using vanced manager.

fields.title: Huawei workaround 2
fields.content:
For those who updated microG to most recent version but now are facing login issues

1. Uninstall current installed Vanced microG.

2. Download "Vanced microG 0.2.12.203316 version" from mega cloud storage mirror [Link to Vanced microG](https://del.dog/vancedv15above)

3. You should be able to login now.

fields.title: Huawei workaround 3
fields.content:
1. Uninstall both vanced and microG if you already installed. Then reinstall only microG(latest available)

2. Then open microG app settings

3. Turn off both "Google Cloud Messaging" and "Google device registration".

4. Add your account through microG itself.

5. Then install Vanced.

fields.title: Huawei workaround 4
fields.content:
1. First, install the old Vanced microG version{particularly microg_YouTube_Vanced_0.2.4-105_16052019_2.apk using [this link](https://www.mediafire.com/file/4mw2q6ajq85g2io/microg_YouTube_Vanced_0.2.4-105_16052019_2.apk/file)}. Make sure to uninstall the current version to install the above version and save the latest APK file as you will be needing it later.

2. Then open YouTube Vanced and try logging in again until it shows the error message. Try to reload it by tapping the error message. 

3. Now install the newer microG version again and restart vanced. It should be logged in again and everything should work again.

NOTE: Now make sure u disable battery optimization for both microG and vanced using https://dontkillmyapp.com otherwise your device software might kill microG and you might have to repeat all above steps again to fix login.

fields.title: Vanced Manager logoda takılıp kalması/çökmesi hatası
fields.content:
There are 2 solutions available. 

 1. Clear app data of manager > Turn internet off > Open manager app > Turn the internet on. 

2 2. For users with RTL languages set on the device, please update your vanced manager to 2.6.0 from our official vanced website.

fields.title: INSTALL_FAILED_INVALID_APK: No packages staged or vanced manager gets stuck at "Please be patient" screen, do this
fields.content: Install the stock YouTube app from the play store then update vanced over it using vanced manager. Make sure you have the latest release of vanced manager from our [official website](https://vancedapp.com) and 21.4+ of magisk

fields.title: If you face "Error downloading microG/Vanced" or installation got stuck while installing microG/vanced app
fields.content: Clear manager app data then continue installing and DON'T SWITCH TO OTHER APPS UNTIL IT COMPLETES THE PROCESS.

fields.title: If you face errors like "Operation failed because apk files are invalid/corrupt"
fields.content:
• Head to manager settings and clear downloaded files. 

 • Then clear manager app data then continue installing vanced.

troubleshooting.title: Package conflict error after updating to Android 11 (INSTALL_FAILED_UPDATE_INCOMPATIBLE)
troubleshooting.description: For notification fix, a white background or Vanced not appearing under "Google Cloud Messaging", see below

fields.title: For Non-Root
fields.content:
1. Install Android Debug Bridge using this [Guide](https://www.xda-developers.com/install-adb-windows-macos-linux). 

2. Unlock your phone. 

3. Enable Developer Mode (tap 10 times on Build number in Settings - About phone -Software information). 

4. Enable USB debugging in Settings - Developer options. 

5. Connect your phone to PC. 

6. Open Command Prompt (CMD) and change directory: "cd C:/Windows/adb/" and press Enter. 

7. As your phone is connected and CMD is open, in CMD run command "adb devices". There will be a prompt on your phone, something like "Would you like to connect your phone to PC?" Press Yes. 

8. Run cmd command "adb uninstall com.vanced.android.youtube". 

9. After this you may install Vanced Manager and install the latest version of YouTube Vanced

fields.title: If Vanced is not showing up under GCM or it shows up as unregistered
fields.content:
1. Use root explorer and navigate to root storage. 

2. Then find this folder when you are installing YT Vanced  "data/app/com.vanced.android.youtube-...." or when you are installing YT Music "com.vanced.android.apps.youtube.music-...."  

3. If you found such folders, just delete them then continue installing YT Vanced or YT music via Vanced Manager.

fields.title: This solution is for YouTube Music Vanced only, not for YouTube Vanced
fields.content: Try manually updating YouTube Music Vanced through the APK file using [this link](https://del.dog/vancedv15above).

fields.title: If both of the above methods fail
fields.content: Apparently, doing a factory reset can fix this error. Do this at last resort.

troubleshooting.title: Force closing issues
troubleshooting.description: For fixing notification on both non-root or root varaints, see below

fields.title: For Non-Root variant
fields.content:
1. Install Vanced microG first then YouTube Vanced.

2. Login with your Google account

3. Disable battery optimization for Vanced microG(the guide dontkillmyapp.com is suggested).

4. Open "Vanced microG" additional settings either using vanced manager or by going into application info.

5. Then continue on with this [guide](https://youtu.be/Q-5YFmFWVok).

fields.title: For Root variant
fields.content:
Make sure "Scheduled Digest" is off in youtube settings and your notifications sounds are correct and set.

You can try using "notification manager" app which keeps track of all your notification at one place so in case if you are dismissing your notifications, you can access the same again from that app.

troubleshooting.title: If YouTube Vanced is not showing up under Google Cloud Messaging(GCM) or it shows up as unregistered
troubleshooting.description:
Try EITHER of the following:

1. Remove your microg account from account settings. The account used by vanced has a dark grey background with G logo on it. 

2. Clear data of microG then login. 

OR

If above workaround doesn't work, reinstall vanced.

troubleshooting.title: Force closing issues
troubleshooting.description: If Vanced app is crashing/force closing on startup

fields.title: Nonroot
fields.content:
1) If you installed YouTube vanced before vanced microG app, uninstall both YouTube vanced and vanced microG. Then install vanced microG first, then Vanced and vanced will stop force closing.

2) If you didn't install vanced microG, please install it and force closing will stop. [Don't log in if you don't want to]

fields.title: Root
fields.content:
1) If your root version of Vanced is force closing upon opening the app, uninstall stock YouTube app updates. If this doesn't help, disable/uninstall your substratum/swift themes overlays.
At last resort, if nothing helps, give the community/staff a logcat.

2) If your root version of Vanced is force closing in middle of app when it's in foreground/active or playing a video, grab your logcats and find:

(a)- Unsatisfiedlinkerror: 
Sol:- Open file manager and go to root storage.
Then open "system/app/youtube/lib" OR "Data/app/com.google.android.youtube/lib" and rename 

arm64-v8a to arm64

armeabi-v7a to arm

and it will get fixed.

Also, if both "arm and arm64" are not there in that directory above, try getting both from official YT apk or ask your friends and extract it there in that directory

(b)- Notehitelisted "com.google.android.youtube":
Sol:- If you're experiencing crashes on YouTube Vanced root variants for whitelisting reasons, you can try this guide from [this link](https://www.xda-developers.com/how-to-fix-device-not-certified-by-google-error) and see if it helps. If Link didn't help, clean flash your ROM or test with a different ROM to resolve this issue. If you don't know how to get logs, check the bugreport template.

fields.title: If Vanced crashes in the middle of playback (when playing in background mode)
fields.content:
Since this issue is only caused by aggressive battery optimization present in various OEM skins such as MIUI, EMUI, ColorOS, etc..., it is recommended to disable battery optimization for both Vanced and MicroG app. 

Instructions to do so vary on your device manufacturer, so we can’t really assist with helping you disable it. You can try using a site like "dontkillmyapp.com", OR using Google and searching “[phone manufacturer] [phone model] [Android version] disable battery optimization”

However, if you still have this issue, provide us with a bugreport on telegram group or discord server with all the necessary details and logs must be there so that Mods can take a look what's actually causing. Also, make sure to grab logs specific to vanced, NOT your whole SYSTEM.

troubleshooting.title: Uninstall on reboot
troubleshooting.description:
If the root version of YouTube Vanced/ YouTube Music Vanced is disappearing/uninstalling/reverting back to stock on reboot,

We have 2 solutions available for you

fields.title: Solution 1
fields.content: Stick to the non-root version until the developers fix this.

fields.title: Solution 2
fields.content:
REQUIREMENTS: Vanced Manager 2.2.0 or newer

 Open Vanced manager and go to settings and find Root Script Sleep Time (you should be on root mode for this option to appear).

2. Then set the value to 2 > hit save, reboot and see if Vanced/Music still disappear. If they still disappear try adjusting the value until they stick after reboot

troubleshooting.title: Advertisements in Vanced
troubleshooting.description:
If you are seeing ads in YouTube Vanced or Vanced Music, read this by xfileFIN:

> I need to get it myself to track it down. As simple layout hiding won't work for that.
Not sure how they decide who gets them, it's all server side.
What I do know is that I can't just hide the layout because the same layout is used for the actual videos as well. The code just decides whether or not it shows the ad badge.
Well I could easily hide the ad badge but it would still show the actual ad video, just without labeling it as ad.
I need to get the ad myself to track it down in the code since obfuscation makes it hard.

The home screen and search ads (added by Google) are region-specific and will not be displayed if you are not in the region where they are active. Those advertisements were not added in any way by the Vanced team, so if you pointed a finger at us, we would laugh at you. 

 With the v16 release, the advertisements have been fully removed. If you happen to see them in your app, please turn off any toggles you turned on mistake relating to ad removal from the vanced settings menu. You can also try clearing data and see if it resolves. When using the cast feature, note that vanced won't block ads while casting.

troubleshooting.title: History
troubleshooting.description:
If you are facing issues where videos watched/search results are not getting recorded by Vanced i.e., history being not working, this is how you get the history working:

• For users who are rooted regardless of which variant (Non-Root or Root) you are using,

 Make sure you whitelist *s.youtube.com in your Ad-Blocker.

> ⚠️NOTE for Adaway users: If whitelisting the URL didn't work for you, tap on "host sources" and untick "stevenblack" and apply, then reboot and your history will work.⚠️

• For Non-Root users:

 Make sure you're on v14.10.53 or higher for the app to save your watch history. If history still doesn't update, then you need to merge your brand account in [YouTube Settings](https://www.youtube.com/account_advanced) to get history working. (Merging process will clean the current history.)

> ⚠️NOTE for Adaway users using VPN Ad-Blocking instead of root based Ad-Blocking: If you are not using brand account, make sure to whitelist *s.youtube.com url in allowed list then apply the changes.⚠️

fields.title: If Vanced got stuck on splash screen, do this;
fields.content:
1. Switch Airplane mode on.
2. Open Youtube Vanced.

3. Tap on close in changelog popup.
4. Turn off Airplane mode.
5. Reopen vanced.

Thanks to rocco6victorFrom XDA

fields.title: If Vanced keeps on loading infinitely, do this;
fields.content:
1. Disable battery optimization for both YouTube Vanced and microG app using dontkillmyapp.com then reboot your device.
2. It should get fixed now.

troubleshooting.title: Picture-in-Picture issues
troubleshooting.description:
⚠️Please don't report PIP related issues.⚠️

• PIP is managed by the Android system because YouTube uses native PIP, and the same is true for YouTube Vanced. Other apps (such as MX Player, VLC, and others) make use of a custom-made PIP. As a result, any problems with PIP should be reported to Google instead.

• PIP is available for android 8 and above only.

• To enable PIP, Open YT app settings > general > enable pip

> To enable pip in MIUI, you have to make sure this setting is on:
Privacy protection->manage->special app accesss->picture-in-picture

fields.title: If you are having trouble downloading vanced files using vancedapp.com or can't open our site due to server/region restrictions
fields.content:
You can get our new manager right [here](https://github.com/YTVanced/VancedManager/releases/)

NOTE: Here you have to choose "manager.apk" in latest release > assets. Don't choose zips or anything else as they are not apks.

fields.title: If you are having trouble downloading and installing vanced via manager, you can still use SAI/manual method to install vanced.
fields.content:
• Use the MediaFire mirror to download the required files.
>https://www.mediafire.com/folder/773e97cz2ezx1/AddFree_Youtube_BackgroundPlay_Enabled

• Use the AFH Mirror to download the required files.
>https://androidfilehost.com/?w=files&flid=170196

NOTES:

A) Since we have all separate apk files on Mediafire and android file host(AFH) now, you have to zip all "base, architecture and language" apk's & install it via SAI. All 3 apk are must.

B) Manual installation can only be done either via root since it requires accessing root storage.

troubleshooting.title: Detach from market
troubleshooting.description: You can use any of the workarounds listed below to remove the YouTube app from the market.

fields.title: Workaround 1(Recommended)
fields.content:
Using [TeMiFi app](https://forum.xda-developers.com/t/app-tool-temefi-comprehensive-system-administration.3806260), Make sure the YouTube Vanced is a user app as this method won't work if Vanced is installed as a system app.

1. Open TeMiFi app and Give root permissions. 

2. Tap on Application info and tap on Detach package from play store option. 

3. Tap on DETACH: Select package then protection level v5 

4. Select YouTube with package name "com.google.android.youtube" 

5. Tap on 3. Invalidate the data, block any attempt.... 

6. Yes, I accept full responsibility 

7. Proft!

fields.title: Workaround 2
fields.content:
Using Titanium backup app(needs pro version)

1. Open titanium backup 

2. Search for youtube and Click on it 

3. Swipe left to access special features 

4. Click on Attach to market 

5. Then again go to special features 

6. Click on "detach from market" 

7. Done

fields.title: Workaround 3
fields.content:
NOTE: Auto-Updates must be disabled in play store before doing this.

1. Create "Detach.txt" in the following location /sdcard/ (equivalent to /storage/emulated/0/) write "YouTube" in that text file without quotes. You can also download the Detach.txt from Magisk module name Detach and remove the # in front of YouTube.

2. Flash Detach module in Magisk manager.

3. Flash Daily Job Scheduler (djs) in Magisk manager.

4. Reboot

5. Open Terminal and type "su -c detach -t" and set it to run once every hour.

6. Done!

Play Store updates its database file on a random rhythm, sometimes several times a day. Once in a while (like once every two weeks), Play Store will show an update for Youtube, but it will go away when the script has run again by djs.

fields.title: Workaround 4
fields.content: Switch to Non-Root variant of Vanced. This workaround should only be used as a last resort if all of the other options fail!

troubleshooting.title: Fix For SAI/Vanced Manager errors
troubleshooting.description: Below are some known reasons you might face when you don't follow instructions, so read the appropriate cause with its solution and fix your problem.

fields.title: INSTALL_FAILED_VERSION_DOWNGRADE
fields.content: Uninstall stock yt updates. Make sure Stock YouTube version is lower than vanced version you are installing now.

fields.title: INSTALL_FAILED_UPDATE_INCOMPATIBE
fields.content:
Just uninstall any vanced app that you have installed from any other source then install vanced.  Otherwise uninstall "vanced microG" > reboot device > then install vanced microG first then Vanced. If error still comes, use SAI to install the vanced split apks manually. These apk files are located in 
"android / data / com.vanced.manager / files / vanced / nonroot / "

fields.title: INSTALL_PARSE_FAILED_NOT_APK
fields.content: Change the language of your phone from Indonesian to English then install vanced. After installing, you can change language back to Indonesian. If your device isn't using Indonesian language, make sure language is properly selected in Vanced manager which you wanna install with YouTube Vanced.

fields.title: INSTALL_FAILED_NO_MATCHING_ABIS
fields.content: Download legacy version instead of default

fields.title: INSTALL_FAILED_INVALID_APK: Split config.en was defined multiple times
fields.content:
Try removing one split_config.en apk from apks file then install
(Apks file is just a zip file so you can easily remove the apk from it)

fields.title: INSTALL_FAILED_DUPLICATE_PERMISSION
fields.content:
Uninstall microG > reboot > install vanced via sai > install microG

If microG doesn't install, install microG too via SAI.

fields.title: Unable to install the app because it conflicts with an already installed app with same package name
fields.content:
Uninstall microG > reboot > install vanced via sai > install microG via apk package installer
If microG doesn't install, install microG too via SAI.

fields.title: APP IS INCOMPATIBLE WITH THIS DEVICE
fields.content: Download the legacy architecture files when downloading vanced files from official vanced mirrors instead of default architecture.

fields.title: INSTALL_PARSE_FAILED_NO_CERTIFICATES
fields.content: It seems like you didn't read instructions properly and installed vanced without disabling signature verification. or you tried some method which didn't give any positive result, so the solution to both is to disable signature verification using the best method/alternative to what you used before or just use our [vanced manager](https://vancedapp.com) which doesn't require you to disable signature verification.

fields.title: INSTALL_FAILED_INVALID_INSTALL_LOCATION
fields.content: Please head to your device settings > developer options and turn off "force allow apps on external" then install the Vanced app in SAI.

fields.title: INSTALL_FAILED_USER_RESTRICTED: Install canceled by user
fields.content: Unknown sources install is protected per service in your MIUI devices Please go to your device settings and enable unknown sources for SAI and issue will get solved and you will be able go install Vanced.

fields.title: INSTALL_FAILED_INTERNAL_ERROR: Permission Denied
fields.content: Disable MIUI optimization from your device developer options.

troubleshooting.title: Live-Stream issues
troubleshooting.description: Solution: Follow this guide > https://youtu.be/R9asMVCQkAU. Also, disable your external ad-blockers/vpn/proxy/custom settings in vanced. Keep stock settings if you don't wanna see any issues.

troubleshooting.title: Black screen video fix
troubleshooting.description:
Solution: clearing data of Youtube Vanced and subsequently reinstalling it should fix the issue. If it doesn't, try a Reboot &
Check if black screen issue solves. 

If problem persist, factory reset your device or change the ROM.

troubleshooting.title: Content Restrictions
troubleshooting.description:
In English it is callled "restricted mode"
In arabic it is called "وضع تقييد المحتوى"

To solve issue of lesser search results, do this

1. Go to settings > General

2. Find "restricted mode" and turn it off.

If you're in a country that Google hates, use a vpn.

troubleshooting.title: View count change
troubleshooting.description:
To change the view count from crores/lakhs to millions, do this:


Solution:

1. Go to settings (of your phone)

2. Go to system 

3. Go to language preferences

4. Add a language as English (US) 

5. Drag this language above your current one.

6. Go to youtube and enjoy ⚡

Thanks to @ROG_OK from telegram Vanced group for finding the fix.

troubleshooting.title: Captions
troubleshooting.description:
If you face caption issues such as random subtitles of different languages on an english video, here's what you have to do; 

1. Open browser and go to youtube desktop site. If you are on a mobile, tap on "Request desktop website". 

2. Now tap on your profile icon from top right corner and tap on Settings. 

3. Then head to "Playback and performance" and uncheck the "Always show captions" box. 

4. Close browser and go to YouTube Vanced app info and clear cache(not data) [not sure if this is necessary, just writing what i did to fix it for myself] 

5. Then open YouTube app and go to settings > captions > set Language to default if it's not. Otherwise skip this step. 

6. Auto captions will be fixed

troubleshooting.title: HDR brightness Workaround
troubleshooting.description: Use the swiping features to turn the brightness to its maximum.

troubleshooting.title: Settings crashes
troubleshooting.description: Turn off your fingerprint scanner and go to the settings to configure it; once finished, turn it back on. It will not crash again unless you restart your device.
